source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_00<tab>Lalai is eager to hear tell of your recent adventures.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_00<tab>Lalai se demande ce que vous devenez.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_01<tab>Lalai is most intrigued by your tales of your journey to and from the First. In return, she shares the news that she has at long last completed her written record of all the knowledge of black magic she has gathered in the course of your adventures together. However, now she faces a dilemma, as despite her pleas, the Order of Nald'thal adamantly refuses to house such potentially dangerous knowledge within their archives. At Lalai's behest─and that of the Hearer Zhai'a Nelhah, who once again has invited himself to join in your adventures─you resolve to accompany your friend to the Arrzaneth Ossuary.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_01<tab>Comme elle l'avait annoncé en conclusion de l'épisode des golems, Lalai a rédigé ses mémoires à destination des futurs mages noirs. Hélas, elle peine à trouver une institution qui acceptera de conserver ses écrits. Même l'ordre de Nald'thal auquel elle appartient a rejeté sa demande. Toutefois, en tant que membre émérite de la guilde des occultistes, vous pourriez faire pencher la balance en sa faveur... Zhai'a Nelhah vous a quant à lui fait part d'un autre problème<var 1D /var>: la signature éthérée de Lalai aurait récemment changé pour une raison inconnue. Laissez cela de côté pour l'instant, et allez à l'ossuaire d'Arrzaneth pour tenter de vaincre les réticences de Yayake.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_02<tab>Upon arriving at the Ossuary, Lalai pleads her case to Prelate Yayake, but her words fall on deaf ears. When you step in to offer your support, the receptionist grudgingly admits that there is one member of the guild who sympathizes with the black mage's argument─and it is none other than Cocobuki, eldest of the five guildmasters. Heartened by the news, Lalai sets off to speak directly with the man himself, in hopes of winning his approval.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_02<tab>Malgré les vives protestations de Lalai, Yayake n'a rien voulu savoir. Elle vous a néanmoins appris que Cocobuki, le maître de la guilde des occultistes, n'était pas hostile à l'idée de conserver un exemplaire du manuscrit polémique. Allez donc lui parler, à l'ossuaire d'Arrzaneth.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_03<tab>Though Guildmaster Cocobuki shares Lalai's perspective regarding the value of her research, he explains that his word alone will not suffice to sway the naysayers. Instead, he proposes that a hearing be held with Prioress Dewlala herself, that the head of the Order of Nald'thal might hear both sides of the argument and render her impartial judgment. Lalai is quick to accept the challenge, and wishes to meet with you outside the Ossuary to work out the details of your argument.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_03<tab>Cocobuki a avancé une solution radicale au problème de Lalai<var 1D /var>: débattre en présence de Dulala, la tête pensante de l'ordre de Nald'thal, et lui laisser le soin de trancher. Sûre de son bon droit, votre amie a aussitôt accepté cette proposition, et vous a enjoint<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> de la suivre hors de l'ossuaire d'Arrzaneth afin de peaufiner ses arguments.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_04<tab>You have barely begun to discuss your argument when Lalai is struck with a bout of dizziness and suddenly collapses. Clearly shaken by the sight, Zhai'a Nelhah swoops the black mage into his arms and rushes off for Frondale's Phrontistery, where he would treat her further.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_04<tab>Lalai s'est soudain mise à tituber avant de perdre con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce, sous le regard affolé de Zhai'a Nelhah. Lui et vous l'avez transportée en urgence à l'Académie médicale de Frondale, sur l'esplanade des Érudits. Écoutez les conclusions de l'élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>te.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_05<tab>Puzzling out the details with the help of knowledge you gleaned from your travels to the First, Zhai'a Nelhah believes he has found a way to restore Lalai's aetheric balance and save her from a grim fate. In return, the Hearer asks that you delay the proceedings with Prioress Dewlala by petitioning Master Cocobuki, but his request is cut short when Lalai arrives to insist the hearing go ahead as planned. She entrusts her magnum opus to you and promises to be along shortly. Taking the tomes that are the fruit of Lalai's labors in hand, you set off back for the Ossuary, where your allies and opponents in this cause await.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_05<tab>Zhai'a Nelhah pense que votre amie souffre d'un dérèglement éthéré du fait d'avoir hébergé les puissants souvenirs de Shatotto. S'il sait comment la soigner, vous devrez toutefois faire face à Yayake <var 08 E905 ((toute seule)) ((tout seul)) /var> dans un premier temps... Faites part de cet imprévu à Cocobuki, à l'ossuaire d'Arrzaneth.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_06<tab>You are doing your best to keep Dewlala's interest piqued when you are rejoined by Lalai, whose aetherial balance has been restored. Thoroughly won over by the black mage's logical and impassioned plea, the Prioress does not merely agree to housing her compendia in the Order's archives, but orders that a new research group dedicated to studying potential applications of black magic be established under Cocobuki's stewardship. Take your leave of this place with your companions, and revel in your hard-earned victory over prescripts and prejudice.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_06<tab>Dès le coup d'envoi de l'audience, Cocobuki a dissipé vos appréhensions en déployant une verve im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nante. Lalai vous a rejoints au point d'orgue du débat et a enfoncé le clou, obtenant de Dulala non seulement la conservation de ses mémoires, mais aussi la création d'un cercle d'études en magie noire dans lequel elle occupera une place de choix. Remerciez Cocobuki, à l'ossuaire d'Arrzaneth, pour ce carton plein.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_07<tab>Cocobuki congratulates Lalai on her success, while also warning her that the true battle to regain people's trust in the art of black magic has only just begun. Lalai restates her vow to work tirelessly toward her life's goal of handing down the art of black magic to future generations, before taking her leave to convey the good tidings to a certain Hearer who also played a role in your triumph.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_07<tab>Lalai a promis à son nouveau supérieur hiérarchique qu'elle n'hésiterait plus à demander de l'aide. Puis elle s'en est allée dire un mot à celui qui s'est surpassé pour la soigner en un temps record, Zhai'a Nelhah. Retrouvez la paire au sanctuaire de Milvaneth.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_08<tab>Zhai'a Nelhah is overjoyed to hear the good tidings, and positively stupefied when Lalai proceeds to offer him genuine words of thanks. The Hearer takes his leave in his typically oblivious and insensitive fashion, upon which Lalai once again thanks you for your efforts on her behalf. Relieved that she need no longer carry on her life's work in the shadows, she asks for your continued support in preserving the art of black magic for posterity.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_SEQ_08<tab>Lalai a chaudement remercié Zhai'a Nelhah, oubliant un instant leur guerre d'egos habituelle. Enfin, elle a réaffirmé sa volonté de tout mettre en œuvre pour permettre aux futurs mages noir de prospérer, un combat qui semble plus que jamais bien engagé...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Yayake at Arrzaneth Ossuary.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_TODO_00<tab>Parler à Yayake, à l'ossuaire d'Arrzaneth

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_000<tab>Welcome back to these halls, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the black. I sense that the dark powers in you are ever burgeoning. Pray tell, where have your travels taken you since last we met?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Ça faisait longtemps. Je peux voir que vous n'avez pas délaissé la magie noire durant mon absence... Sans indiscrétion, où étiez-vous passé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_300<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_300<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_301<tab>I traveled to a world flooded with Light.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_301<tab>J'ai visité un monde inondé par la Lumière.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_302<tab>I felled a great mage in battle.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_302<tab>J'ai vaincu une créature ayant l'apparence d'un ancien héros.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_001<tab>A journey to another world, you say? Intriguing, indeed. Consider me impressed...and even a bit envious.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_001<tab>Fascinant. Tout ceci est fascinant... et notamment un point en particulier.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_002<tab>How you were able to peer into the past of the archmage Nyelbert, and form a bond across the ages with his young friend Taynor. Though the circumstances are not entirely the same, I cannot help but think back to my own encounter with the great Shatotto.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_002<tab>Si j'en crois votre histoire, le lien entre ce mage, Naillebert, et son ami d'enfance Taynor a transcendé le temps et l'espace. Voilà qui n'est pas sans rappeler ma rencontre avec l'esprit de Shatotto...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_003<tab>Speaking of which, I, too, have been keeping myself occupied. Why, I have recorded every detail we learned on our last adventure in writing, that we might preserve Shatotto's knowledge for posterity, and avert any similar calamity that may threaten future generations.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_003<tab>Pour ma part, l'incident des golems m'a fait prendre conscience de l'importance de préserver à tout prix nos con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ces. Vous serez <var 08 E905 ((heureuse)) ((heureux)) /var> d'apprendre que j'ai bien avancé dans l'écriture de mes mémoires.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_004<tab>Just the other day, I put the finishing touches on the final chapter of the final volume, concluding with Shatotto's departure. There is, however, one lingering...hmm?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_004<tab>Je viens tout juste de finir d'immortaliser les adieux de Shatotto. Seulement voilà, j'ai un petit prob...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_006<tab>(-???-)Well, fancy that! I come to check up on Lalai here, and who do I find but our old friend <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_006<tab>(-???-)Je viens rendre visite à Lalai, et qui vois-je<var 1D /var>? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Deux mages noirs pour le prrrix d'un<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_007<tab>Well, if it isn't everyone's favorite mutton-headed Hearer. I need neither your support nor your sympathy, but I suppose you've never been one to let that stop you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_007<tab>Ce cher rabat-joie de Zhai'a Nelhah<var 1D /var>! Que me vaut un tel honneur<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_008<tab>Come now, Lalai. You yourself mentioned that you were at a loss for what to do with the records you had scribed, yes? I simply hoped to inquire as to whether there have been any fruitful developments on that front.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_008<tab>Ah, euh... L'autre jour, quand je suis venu t'annoncer que l'incident des golems était of<var 16 /var>fi<var 16 /var>ciel<var 16 /var>le<var 16 /var>ment clos, tu t'inquiétais de ne trouver aucune institution qui accepte de conserver tes mémoirrres. Je me demandais si tu avais résolu le problème depuis.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_009<tab>...Hmph. So you mean to rub salt in my wounds, yes? There have been no developments, fruitful or otherwise. I consulted with my brothers and sisters at the Order of Nald'thal, but to the last man they refused to even entertain the thought.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_009<tab>Toujours pas, hélas... Je pensais pouvoir les confier à l'ordre de Nald'thal, vu que j'en fais partie. Mais les autres membres m'ont opposé un refus catégorique.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_010<tab>You consulted with... Do you mean to say that you are still a member of the Order!? Why, I had always assumed that you had been excommunicated for your pursuit of the dark arts!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_010<tab>Attends... Tu appartiens toujours à l'orrrdre de Nald'thal<var 1D /var>? J'étais persuadé qu'ils t'auraient radiée dès l'instant où tu es devenue mage noir.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_011<tab>Excommunicated!? Simply for the pursuit of knowledge? Perish the thought! Though, to be fair, there are many holier-than-thou types in the Order who share this pigheaded Hearer's opinion...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_011<tab>Je t'aurais bien dit de ravaler tes préjugés, mais tu n'as pas tout à fait tort... Mes camarades ne voient pas ça d'un très bon œil. Le fait qu'un de leurs diacres mène des recherches sur une science interdite, ça les défrise...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_012<tab>Irrespective of this, the fact remains that the Order sealed away countless tomes in their vaults when they forbid the art of black magic. Storing my own writings with them, I would argue, is the most logical option.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_012<tab>Mais leur méfiance a un bon côté<var 1D /var>: là-bas, tous les écrits qui se rapportent à la magie noire sont im<var 16 /var>mé<var 16 /var>dia<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment confisqués et mis sous scellés. Je ne pourrais rêver bibliothèque plus sûre pour mes mémoires.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_013<tab>But no─they are too prudish and prejudiced against yours truly to listen to reason. Then again, perhaps if a thaumaturge in good standing with the Order were to put in a good word on my behalf...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_013<tab>Attendez... Si je ne m'abuse, vous faites partie de la guilde des occultistes<var 1D /var>? Sachant qu'elle est étroitement liée à l'ordre de Nald'thal, peut-être que vous auriez une chance de les faire changer d'avis...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_014<tab>...You may indeed find a more sympathetic ear. What do you say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_014<tab>Ça ne coûte rrrien d'essayer. Qu'en pensez-vous, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_015<tab>Excellent! Then let us hurry to the Ossuary and see if we can't convince that insufferably stuffy Yayake to see good sense.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_015<tab>Merci, c'est gentil<var 1D /var>! Allons tout de suite à l'ossuaire d'Arrzaneth, si vous voulez bien. Attaquons-nous d'abord à ma principale détractrice, j'ai nommé Yayake<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_016<tab>A moment if you please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. To tell the truth, the question of where to store her records is not the only matter that concerns me about Lalai of late.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_016<tab>Psst... De vous à moi, si je suis venu voir Lalai aujourd'hui, c'est parce que j'ai remarrrqué quelque chose d'inhabituel chez elle lors de ma dernière visite.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_017<tab>Recently, I cannot help but feel that the aetheric power within her is...shifting, warping in ways that I have not felt before. As for why this is, I cannot yet be sure. Until we discover more, pray look after her, will you?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_017<tab>J'ignorrre pourquoi, mais sa signature éthérée a changé... Ce n'est peut-être qu'une fluctuation passagère, mais prêtez-y attention, on ne sait jamais...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_050<tab>My apologies, but I believe it best that I remain here until your negotiations are complete. I shudder to think of the consequences if my colleagues at the Conjurers' Guild found out I was conspiring with the likes of you and Lalai. Nothing personal, of course.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_050<tab>Je vais m'abstenirrr de vous suivre. Je ne voudrais pas qu'on croie que vous êtes de mèche avec la guilde des élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_055<tab>I swear, for a veteran of the Order, she has all the sense of a simpering child!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_055<tab>Hmph... Rien que de voir sa tête, ça m'énerve<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_070<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Well, this is an unexpected surprise. And not an entirely pleasant one, though it is by no fault of your own...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_070<tab>Je ne pensais pas que Lalai irait jusqu'à vous appeler en renfort... Je suis confuse.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_071<tab>The unmitigated <var 1A 02 /var>gall<var 1A 01 /var> of you, Lalai! Did you honestly believe that dragging poor <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here─against <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> will, no doubt─would convince me to agree to housing your shameful scribblings in our archives?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_071<tab>Lalai, ça commence à bien faire, vos caprices<var 1D /var>! Je vous rappelle que c'est vous qui vous êtes aliéné vos camarades, en vous obstinant à suivre les en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments de Ququruka le damné<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_072<tab>I have said it once, and I will say it again. Until the day you renounce the depraved teachings of Ququruka, you will find no friends here. I would see those books burn before I give them a home here─for our sake, and for your own!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_072<tab>Nous avons eu l'indulgence de vous garder parmi nous, et vous renchérissez avec un livre polémique<var 1D /var>! Un conseil, arrêtez vos recherches et jetez votre manuscrit à la poubelle avant de vous faire expulser pour de bon<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_073<tab>I swear, despite that pretentious monocle, you remain as blind as a bat to the big picture. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the black! Talk some sense into this overstuffed secretary!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_073<tab>Mon livre n'a rien de polémique, vous le sauriez si vous l'aviez lu<var 1D /var>! Oh, et puis zut<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, parlez-lui, à cette bécasse, moi j'abandonne<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_100<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_101<tab>Should the tomes not be sealed away for safekeeping?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_101<tab>Personne ne veut de ses mémoires<var 1D /var>? Même pas au rayon des livres défendus<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_102<tab>Do all in the Order agree with your decision?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_102<tab>Tous les membres de l'ordre de Nald'thal pensent comme vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_080<tab>...Hm. At least one of us here is capable of communicating like an adult.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_080<tab>Ah, voilà au moins quelqu'un qui ne m'aboie pas dessus...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_081<tab>I will grudgingly admit that there is one other who shares Lalai's sentiments. In fact, it is none other than our very own guildmaster, Master Cocoba...Cocobe...er, what was the name again?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_081<tab>Puisque vous voulez tout savoir, l'un de nos membres s'est inscrit en faux contre notre décision. Il s'agit du maître de la guilde des occultistes, Coco... quelque chose.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_082<tab>Cocobuki! Hah! It does not surprise me in the least. Come, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Let us present our case to someone wise enough to understand it.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_082<tab>Cocobuki<var 1D /var>! Allons le chercher tout de suite<var 1D /var>! Trois voix dissidentes valent mieux que deux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_090<tab>After all you have done for our guild, I felt you deserved an answer to your query, and so I gave you one. And yet I advise you to proceed with caution. Lalai has few allies here, and I would hate to see your pristine reputation sullied by association.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_090<tab>J'ai été gentille parce que c'est vous, mais si Lalai ne calme pas ses ardeurs, je n'hésiterai pas à sévir.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_091<tab>Who cares if everyone else in this place is an insufferable dunderhead? With the guildmaster himself on our side, the argument is as good as won!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_091<tab>N'en déplaise à Yayake, j'ai un allié, et pas n'importe lequel<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_100<tab>Hm hm hm... I was wondering who might be behind the screaming and stamping that echoed all the way to this chamber. Sister Lalai, was it?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_100<tab>Hé hé hé... Je savais que vous viendriez. Et non, je ne suis pas devin... Vos vives protestations ont résonné jusqu'ici.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_101<tab>Yes, it is true. I find myself rather convinced by the young lady's argument. It is all but impossible for us to prevent any and all from studying the dark arts.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_101<tab>Vous le savez sans doute, je suis pour la conservation de vos mémoires. La raison est simple<var 1D /var>: puisqu'on ne peut vous empêcher de vous adonner à cette discipline controversée, autant garder au moins une trace écrite de vos expériences.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_102<tab>Why, then, not keep this dangerous knowledge close at hand, where we keep an ever-watchful eye on those who would pursue it? And yet, I fear that my own view is not a popular one, and my power to influence the others is far from absolute.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_102<tab>Hélas, il est difficile de faire entendre ma voix face à tous ceux qui redoutent que votre savoir ne tombe entre de mauvaises mains, Yayake en tête...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_103<tab>And so I would offer a proposal. Let us state our case directly to the head of the Order─to Prioress Dewlala herself─that she might pass judgment.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_103<tab>Aussi, j'ai une proposition à vous faire. Dame Dulala est au sommet de notre hiérarchie, son avis fait loi. Pourquoi ne pas plaider notre cause devant elle et demander son arbitrage<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_104<tab>You and Lalai shall argue in favor of accepting the tomes, and those opposing shall argue against. Should all go well, the prioress will agree to the proposal, and the tomes will have a safe home.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_104<tab>Les partisans et détracteurs de votre livre seraient représentés par leurs figures de proue respectives. Chacun pourrait énoncer ses arguments, et dame Dulala aurait le dernier mot.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_105<tab>And yet, the plan is not without risk. Should your argument be less than convincing, there remains a chance Dewlala may expressly forbid any further research. Why, if she is in a particularly foul mood, your very place in the Order may suddenly become...quite tenuous.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_105<tab>Vous obtiendrez peut-être un passe-droit si vous êtes assez habile. Ça ou on vous interdira de recherche à la première maladresse...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_106<tab>Hah! As if there is a chance <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> words could be anything but persuasive. I accept! Pray summon the prioress at her earliest convenience.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_106<tab>... Je n'ai pas peur des con<var 16 /var>sé<var 16 /var>quen<var 16 /var>ces<var 1D /var>! Prévenez tout de suite dame Dulala que nous demandons audience.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_107<tab>Well, that settles it. We'd best hurry and prepare our argument─out of our enemies' earshot, of course. Come with me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_107<tab>Nous devons préparer notre argumentaire, mais pas en territoire ennemi... Sortons d'ici<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_120<tab>For whatever it avails you, I shall voice my opinion in favor. No doubt Prelate Yayake will take her place at the head of the opposition.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_120<tab>Compte sur moi pour représenter le camp des pro-Lalai. Quant à mon adversaire, je suppose qu'il s'agira de Yayake.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_121<tab>On another matter, is Lalai quite all right? I could not help but sense the aether within her swirling in a most unusual fashion...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_121<tab>Au fait, rien à voir, mais j'ai remarqué que l'éther de Lalai était quelque peu troublé... J'espère que ce n'est rien de grave.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_125<tab>Lalai seems to be in unusually good spirits─I trust the negotiations went well. And yet, something concerns me...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_125<tab>Je suis venu voirrr où vous en êtes...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_140<tab>This is our chance, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We simply must convince the prioress at all costs! The future of our art depends on it!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_140<tab>La roue tourne, enfin... Il faut à tout prix qu'on arrive à convaincre dame Dulala<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_141<tab>...Hm? What is this curious sensation?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_141<tab>... Oh là, euh...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_142<tab>Lalai! I knew something was amiss. The aether within you is transforming in a most unusual way...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_142<tab>Lalai, tout va bien<var 1D /var>!? Ton étherrr a eu comme un soubresaut...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_143<tab>I must admit, I have not felt quite myself lately. My head...it feels as heavy as stone...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_143<tab>C-ce n'est rien... J'ai des migraines, ces derniers temps...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_144<tab>...No, this will not do. I'm afraid I must insist that you submit to a full examination before the hearing commences...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_144<tab>Mieux vaut qu'elle se fasse examiner avant son audi...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_145<tab>Lalai! Lalai, c-can you hear me!? S-Someone fetch a healer or a...wait, that's me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_145<tab>L-Lalai<var 1D /var>!? Juste ciel... Vite, appelez quelqu'un<var 1D /var>! Un soigneurrr, un élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>te, n'importe qui<var 1D /var>!<var 1D /var>... Hé, mais je suis tout ça à la fois, moi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_146<tab>Th-This is no time for p-p-panicking, friend! We must c-carry her to the Phrontistery with all speed!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_146<tab>D-d'accord, pas de panique... Emmenons-la à l'Académie médicale de Frrrondale, je verrai ce que je peux faire pour elle là-bas. Dépêchons<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_160<tab>I fear it is as I suspected. The aetheric balance within her has broken down entirely...and unchecked energies are now eating away at her from within.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_160<tab>C'est ce que je craignais... L'étherrr de Lalai s'est déréglé jusqu'à atteindre un point de rupture.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_161<tab>I can only assume that playing host to Shatotto's memories has put a terrible strain on her─one from which she has yet to completely recover.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_161<tab>D'après moi, le fait qu'elle a porté en elle les souvenirs de Shatotto et leur énerrrgie destructrice n'y est pas étranger.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_162<tab>Yes, it would seem that her mind and spirit are in mortal peril. I have never witnessed this degree of aetheric imbalance before. I do not suppose you have...?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_162<tab>Son équilibre éthéré est com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment chamboulé. C'est la premièrrre fois que je vois ça...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_200<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_200<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_201<tab>I saw a world consumed by Light...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_201<tab>Ça me rappelle le déluge de Lumière.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_202<tab>I saw a man transform into an unholy abomination...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_202<tab>J'ai vu des gens se transformer en purgateurs à cause de ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_165<tab>...I see. I can scarcely imagine all you have witnessed in your travels, but an imbalance of aether similar to what I now observe in Lalai would appear to be behind the phenomena you describe.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_165<tab>... Vous me dites que cet autre monde a été englouti par la Lumière... en d'autres terrrmes, que la puissance ombrale y a pris le dessus... et que ce déséquilibre a transformé ses habitants en entités appelées “purgateurs”...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_166<tab>If we can assume that the memories of Shatotto taking up residence in Lalai's corporeal form stimulated her aetheric flow, causing it to shift violently in an astral direction...then it only stands to reason we could restore balance by introducing a counteracting umbral aspect!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_166<tab>Hmm... Ça y est, j'ai compris<var 1D /var>! Chez Lalai, c'est le contrairrre<var 1D /var>: les souvenirs de Shatotto ont en quelque sorte agité l'éther de son âme, et l'ont fait pencher du côté astral<var 1D /var>! Si l'on parvenait simplement à renverser la vapeur...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_167<tab>By the Twelve, I think I've got it! And yet, the process will not be quick...nor easy. I suppose we've no choice but to ask Master Cocobuki to delay the hearing...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_167<tab>... Je crois que je sais comment la guérirrr<var 1D /var>! Seulement, votre audience avec dame Dulala devra attendre qu'elle soit rétablie.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_168<tab>(-???-)Delay the hearing!? Have you lost what little wits you had!? Why, if word got out that my condition was the result of my pursuit of the dark arts, it would all but seal Yayake's case against me!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_168<tab>(-???-)Ah non, pas question de remettre ça à plus tard<var 1D /var>! Si le camp d'en face apprend que je suis souffrante à cause de la magie noire, il aura un argument imparable à faire valoir<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_170<tab>No, we must proceed as planned, before our opponents are the wiser. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, here is my magnum opus─the fruits of all we went through together. I leave them in your capable hands. Go on ahead, and I will be along in due time.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_170<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, je vous confie mon manuscrit. Allez ouvrir les hostilités, je vous rejoindrai dès que possible.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_171<tab>Are you mad!? You can't possibly mean to attend the proceedings in your current condition.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_171<tab>T-tu comptes te rrrendre à l'audience dans ton état actuel<var 1D /var>? Non mais ça va pas, la tête<var 1D /var>!?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_172<tab>Of course not.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_172<tab>Ne t'en fais pas, je serai sur pied à temps.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_173<tab>Fortunately, I just so happen to know a Hearer who─despite being an insufferable stick-in-the-mud─has proven himself more than capable in the healing arts.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_173<tab>Après tout, j'ai à mon chevet l'un des élé<var 16 /var>men<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>lis<var 16 /var>tes les plus doués de sa profession<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_174<tab>Lalai...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_174<tab>Lalai, je...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_175<tab>Very well...leave it to me. I will see that you are back on your feet before the judgment is rendered.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_175<tab>Entendu. Je te requinquerrrai coûte que coûte avant la fin de l'audience.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_176<tab>Until then, I suppose it is up to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> here. Godsspeed, my friend.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_176<tab>D'ici là, tenez bon face à la verve de Yayake.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_180<tab>I have heard that we will be pleading our cases to Prioress Dewlala herself. It matters little to me─when she has heard my argument, she will have no choice but to rule in my favor.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_180<tab>J'ai eu vent de votre plan. N'allez pas croire que je vais me démonter face à dame Dulala. J'ai des arguments ex<var 16 /var>trê<var 16 /var>me<var 16 /var>ment solides.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_190<tab>Hm hm hm... Lalai will be joining the proceedings a touch late, you say? That is most...unlike her, to say the least.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_190<tab>Lalai aura du retard, tu dis<var 1D /var>? Hmm... J'imagine qu'il s'agit d'un contretemps indépendant de sa volonté.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_191<tab>She has entrusted her records to you? Very well. With any luck, we will be able to use them to our advantage. Now, allow me to see them. The prioress will be here all too soon...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_191<tab>Du moment que tu as ses mémoires, nous devrions pouvoir nous en sortir. Nous n'avons de toute façon pas le choix, dame Dulala est déjà en route...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_200<tab>Lalai has not even the courtesy to arrive on time to the hearing she herself requested? I swear, the woman's selfishness knows no bounds! I move that her request be dismissed immediately. It is...for her own good.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_200<tab>Je n'en reviens pas... Absente à sa propre audience... Je ne sais pas à quoi joue Lalai, mais si elle continue sur cette pente glissante, elle va finir par s'en mordre les doigts. Et je ne vois pas l'utilité d'en débattre, soit dit en passant.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_201<tab>Her own good...? Yes...it is as I suspected. You speak from your own experience...don't you, child?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_201<tab>... Yayake, vous semblez parler en con<var 16 /var>nais<var 16 /var>san<var 16 /var>ce de cause. Serait-ce parce que vous avez déjà eu affaire à un cas de figure similaire<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_202<tab>I recall that you, too, once took an unpopular position in support of your erstwhile Master Mumuepo...one that earned you only the ire of your brothers and sisters.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_202<tab>Au hasard... celui de votre ancien maître, Mumuepo<var 1D /var>? Suite à son incarcération, vous avez été quelque peu houspillée par vos pairs... L'ostracisme dont Lalai est victime en ce moment trouve forcément chez vous une résonance par<var 16 /var>ti<var 16 /var>cu<var 16 /var>liè<var 16 /var>re.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_203<tab>Yes...and what of it!? I fought for a hopeless cause that in the end served only to isolate me from my peers. Is it so wrong that I wish to save Lalai from a similar fate? She must abandon this farce at once and return to her rightful place in the Order!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_203<tab>... Ce n'est pas se rendre service que de n'en faire qu'à sa tête alors qu'on est seul contre tous. Je voudrais juste qu'elle rentre dans le rang avant qu'il ne soit trop tard.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_204<tab>To this, I cannot agree. In the short time before these proceedings, I perused what I could of these tomes. In their pages are writ not only forbidden secrets of black magic, but accounts of astounding phenomena the likes of which even I could scarcely imagine.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_204<tab>Vous pensez qu'elle sera heureuse de la sorte<var 1D /var>? Ses mémoires sont plus qu'un précis de magie noire, vous savez. Elles sont le récit de son vécu, des exploits qu'elle a accomplis indépendamment de l'ordre de Nald'thal.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_205<tab>Lalai conducted her research without the support─or interference─of the Order, and the fruits that research has borne cannot be denied. While our guild could not support a thousand others like her, I see little to gain from stifling one woman's passion, and forcing her to work within such rigid rules and regulations.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_205<tab>Chacune de ses pages transpire la passion et le travail. Alors oui, la cohésion d'un groupe exige parfois le sacrifice de certaines libertés, mais est-ce une raison pour proscrire toute initiative personnelle<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_206<tab>The merits of both arguments are not lost on me. And yet I must confess a degree of ignorance about the matter at hand. All know that black magic was forbidden for its role in bringing disaster to our world. And yet, you still practice this art. Tell me, adventurer─is this magic as calamitous as the rumors say?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_206<tab>Nous n'aurions pas ce débat si l'objet de la passion de Lalai n'était pas aussi redoutable... Aussi j'aimerais vous poser une question, mage noir... pensez-vous que votre discipline soit dangereuse<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_000<tab>How will you respond?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_Q1_000_000<tab>Que répondez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_001<tab>It depends on who wields it, and to what end.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_001<tab>Tout dépend de qui s'en sert.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_002<tab>Destruction, too, can bring salvation.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_A1_000_002<tab>La destruction est parfois nécessaire.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_210<tab>If I understand you correctly, you would argue that in the right hands, even the art of destruction might serve the greater good. And yet, how are we to be certain that this Sister Lalai can be trusted with such potentially ruinous knowledge?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_210<tab>À l'évidence, ce n'est pas le genre de pouvoir à mettre entre toutes les mains... À votre avis, Lalai saura-t-elle l'utiliser à bon escient<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_211<tab>There are times when vast destructive powers are needed...this is your claim? From my observations, I suppose you may be right. And yet, how are we to be certain that this Sister Lalai can be trusted with such potentially ruinous knowledge?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_211<tab>Certaines situations de crise appellent des moyens ex<var 16 /var>cep<var 16 /var>tion<var 16 /var>nels, en effet. On l'a vu récemment avec l'incident des golems.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_212<tab>My apologies, Prioress! By your leave, I would tell my tale.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_212<tab>Désolée du retard<var 1D /var>! Dame Dulala, ne tirez pas vos conclusions avant d'avoir entendu ma plaidoirie<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_213<tab>Black magic is an inherently dangerous art...this I cannot and will not deny. Never would I suggest that even a single mage pursue this path without full knowledge of the perils that lie ahead.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_213<tab>Tout d'abord, j'aimerais que nous soyons au clair sur un point<var 1D /var>: oui, la magie noire est dangereuse<var 1D /var>; et je ne prétends pas qu'il faille l'enseigner au plus grand nombre.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_214<tab>That is precisely why I have recorded in painstaking detail not only the arcane knowledge I have gleaned, but every last one of the myriad phenomena both wondrous and terrifying I have experienced in its pursuit.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_214<tab>Du reste, ce n'est pas la finalité de mon livre, qui est avant tout une trace écrite de mes aventures passées.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_215<tab>Unbreakable bonds formed with beastmen we once thought our sworn enemy, bodies and souls consumed by the pursuit of forbidden knowledge, an unspeakable calamity revisited upon our world after millennia...! We must leave this knowledge to posterity, that our sons and daughters do not repeat the mistakes of our past!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_215<tab>J'y parle de ma coopération avec des hommes-bêtes, des victimes de la magie noire, ou encore de la comète qui est revenue nous hanter après plusieurs millénaires. Autant de récits que je veux transmettre aux générations futures.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_216<tab>Those who do not learn from history are doomed to repeat it. This is the crux of your argument, yes?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_216<tab>Si je comprends bien, vous souhaitez que vos successeurs tirent des en<var 16 /var>sei<var 16 /var>gne<var 16 /var>ments de votre expérience...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_217<tab>...Very well. Master Cocobuki, I hereby order you to establish a research organization under the auspices of your guild to further study the impact of black magic. I also grant you permission to store the aforementioned tomes in your archives─under the condition that Sister Lalai oversees them.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_DEWLALA_000_217<tab>... J'ai pris ma décision. Cocobuki, vous fonderez un cercle d'études en magie noire que Lalai intégrera aussitôt. Si vous respectez cette condition, j'autoriserai la conservation de ses mémoires.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_218<tab>...Understood. I will see that both the tomes and Lalai herself find a safe home within our halls.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_218<tab>... Ce sera avec plaisir. En tant que partisan du livre en question, je ferai en sorte de défendre la place de son auteur parmi nous.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_219<tab>I am still not entirely convinced, but if the guildmaster himself is willing to accept responsibility...I have no reason to oppose.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_219<tab>Lalai aura donc un garde-fou en votre personne. Ma foi, pourquoi pas...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_220<tab>Prioress Dewlala, Master Cocobuki...I cannot thank you enough. Mark my words: you will not regret this decision. I will see to it that this knowledge is passed down as it should be─that the errors of our past will never be repeated.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_220<tab>Que dire... si ce n'est que c'est tout ce que j'espérais, et plus encore<var 1D /var>! Comptez sur moi, je vais me donner corps et âme pour mettre la magie noire au service d'un avenir meilleur<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_240<tab>To think the day would come that our art would be recognized once more!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_240<tab>Cette fois, c'est fait<var 1D /var>! La magie noire est enfin sortie de l'ombre<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_245<tab>One thing I will say for Lalai: she is passionate about her beliefs. Worry not─I will see that she is treated fairly by her brothers and sisters.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_YAYAKE_000_245<tab>Ah, Lalai... Je vais continuer de la surveiller de près, au cas où elle serait tentée de faire bande à part.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_260<tab>Well, I do believe the proceedings went about as well as could be expected. I suppose this means that Lalai is now directly under my supervision.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_260<tab>Tu vois que ce n'était pas si difficile de trouver un terrain d'entente. En prime, me voilà devenu le supérieur direct de Lalai.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_261<tab>Don't think you'll be getting free rein around here simply because I vouched for you, child. I expect regular reports on any and all of your findings─only through transparency will black magic ever be accepted by doubters and skeptics.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_261<tab>Faites-moi part de tous vos tracas dorénavant. Je sais que ce n'est pas toujours facile, mais dites-vous qu'on ne résout rien en restant seul dans son coin.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_262<tab>Understood. I shall begin to prepare my first report at once. But before that, there is another with whom I'd like to share these tidings. That is...by your leave, Guildmaster?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_262<tab>Je comprends. À ce propos, il y a une autre personne à qui je dois une fière chandelle. Vous permettez que j'aille la voir tout de suite<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_263<tab>I believe you know well of whom I speak. He awaits us at the Sacrarium. Come along, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_263<tab>Ce bon vieux Zhai'a Nelhah doit nous attendre au sanctuaire de Milvaneth. Allons-y<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_270<tab>I am relieved to see the girl's aetheric balance restored. I suppose it was one of your companions who aided in this, yes?
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_COCOBUKI_000_270<tab>L'éther de Lalai est redevenu normal. Je présume que c'est grâce à cette autre personne<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_275<tab>Lalai has already shared the good news with me. Why, I could not be happier for the both of you!
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_275<tab>Alors comme ça, vous avez réussi à convaincrrre dame Dulala<var 1D /var>? Voilà qui est inespéré<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_290<tab>And so, you see... I simply thought that, well...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_290<tab>Je lui ai raconté notre victoire sur Yayake. Et sinon... Hmm, comment dire...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_291<tab>Whatever is the matter, Lalai? This is your moment of triumph! I would expect you to be more...triumphant.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_291<tab>... Il y a autre chose<var 1D /var>? J'ai du mal à croire que tu aies encorrre des doléances après un triomphe pareil...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_292<tab>Of course I am! It is simply that, well... Clearly, I could not have...I <var 1A 02 /var>did not<var 1A 01 /var> accomplish this on my own, so...
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_292<tab>Non, non, ce n'est pas ça... Simplement, je réalise que je n'y serais jamais arrivée toute seule...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_293<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the black. And yes, you as well, Zhai'a Nelhah. You have my...deepest gratitude.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_293<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Zhai'a Nelhah... C'est grâce à vous si j'en suis là aujourd'hui. Merci du fond du cœur.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_294<tab>Well, I daresay this has been a momentous day in more ways than one. Once again, Lalai, my congratulations. And...you are most welcome.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_294<tab>Ça me fait tout drrrôle de t'entendre dire ça, mais bon... De rien, Lalai. Fé<var 16 /var>li<var 16 /var>ci<var 16 /var>ta<var 16 /var>tions pour ta nouvelle affectation.

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_295<tab>And with that, I should be on my way. When next we meet, I would introduce my colleagues from Stillglade Fane. Now that you are no longer a pariah, I suppose they would not be averse to exchanging knowledge with you.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_ZHAIANELHAH_000_295<tab>La prochaine fois, tu me prrrésenteras tes nouveaux collègues, hé hé<var 1D /var>! Sur ce...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_296<tab>...And just when I was beginning to take a liking to that dolt.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_296<tab>Ah là là... Pourquoi faut-t-il toujours qu'il en rajoute<var 1D /var>? Enfin bref...

source: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_297<tab>At any rate, though my official position may have changed, my mission remains the same: I will do all in my power to preserve our art for future generations. Pray continue to lend me your aid...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the black.
target: TEXT_LUCKBC007_03216_LALAI_000_297<tab>Je vais poursuivre mon travail de recherche, dans un cadre un peu plus officiel cette fois<var 1D /var>! Mais mon objectif reste le même<var 1D /var>: préparer le terrain pour les futurs mages noirs. Ne lâchons rien, vous et moi<var 1D /var>!
